title: Alfredbolk
author: Alfredbolk
content: The Full Support Network For Thriving Crypto &  NFT Projects. _______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________         WEBSITE | TWITTER  | YOUTUBE  | TELEGRAM  |_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________What Do Thriving Web3 Founders Have In Common?They have a full support network. That’s why ultra-successful founders join Crypto Insider. Get the information, support community, and guidance you need from experts like Tony Drummond who pushed his project past $200MM.Our Concept:Enable high-ticket consulting for an affordable price through a membership model. Members get >$17,000 of value for $450 per month.Who Are We?We are multiple founders of projects that reached a market cap of $200 million and attracted 70,000 owners within three weeks. After starting a consulting company to help founders achieve the same success, we noticed a big gap:Often founders can't afford a >$350 consultant, so they have their tokenomics created by a marketing agency or a few consultants who have never had their projects. BIG MISTAKE. Even the slightest mistake in creating tokenomics can cost the whole project or at least drastically reduce the chances of success. But tokenomics are not the only problem: the entire marketing setup, fundraising process, and all other issues often need to be corrected. We've seen founders with great ideas squander all their potential by choosing the wrong tactics and strategies.What Are We Doing Differently?:We are ultra-successful founders from all areas (especially GameFi) and, therefore, can consult founders much better than all those „self-claimed “ experts.USECASES:Setup your tokenomics the right way - Let advisors who drove 9-figure growth with their project help you create the perfect tokenomicsRaise funds faster. Let people who drove 9-figure growth with their project help you create the perfect investor pitch and use our database to target thousands of VCs and Angels._______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________Gain insider knowledge. Learn from our lived experiences in starting, launching and running a top-tier project. Understand what really drives success without spending thousands on private consulting. Click Here_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________Growth hack your crypto project. Use the most complete database of Web3 resources to growth hack your project to success, acquire valuable collaborations with influencers, hop on the latest podcasts, or acquire major VC investments.Learn More         WEBSITE | TWITTER  | YOUTUBE  | TELEGRAM  |

comments.author: Albam Jorden
comments.body: Crypto Insider seems interesting . I would like to know more about your project.

comments.author: joebic541
comments.body: Can I fundraise for my idea? I want to launch my project but I need investors. Can I present my idea to the investor in your platform?

comments.author: deivisr86
comments.body: Do you have any content for new founder? I would like to learn about lunching new project.

comments.author: Abusadaoxes
comments.body: Can I only buy the lists?

comments.author: Alfredbolk
comments.created_time: December 03, 2022, 02:13:26 PMLast edit: May 20, 2023, 03:04:23 PM by Welsh
comments.body: Quote from: joebic541 on November 29, 2022, 08:28:28 PMCan I fundraise for my idea? I want to launch my project but I need investors. Can I present my idea to the investor in your platform?Yes, there is a separate section for this and we actively connect our members to VCs. You can also reach out to us and we can give you an example.Quote from: Abusadaoxes on December 03, 2022, 11:48:56 AMCan I only buy the lists?Our cheapest monthly plan is only $150 and includes all the lists. So you can download all lists for basically that price  [Moderator note: consecutive posts merged (separated via horizontal lines)]

comments.author: FrederickDawson
comments.body: Your website seems really good for new founders. I do have question, What do you mean with a „HNW“ network which is stated on your website?

comments.author: Alfredbolk
comments.body: Quote from: FrederickDawson on December 03, 2022, 03:10:40 PMYour website seems really good for new founders. I do have question, What do you mean with a „HNW“ network which is stated on your website?Hello,Thanks for your kind words. We are in Web3 since 2014 and have a huge network including Hollywood producers, top VCs, exchange CEOs, and many more. We can connect our members if there is a fit.
